item.title: Simple Gingerbread Men Kids Can Decorate
item.description: These delightful gingerbread men are not only fun to make but also a joy to decorate! Perfect for holiday gatherings, they bring a warm, spicy aroma to your kitchen and create lasting memories with family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: 25 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 24

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 3 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon ground ginger
  • 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 cup brown sugar, packed
  • 1/2 cup molasses
  • 1 large egg
  • Royal icing for decoration
  • Assorted candies for decorating

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a bowl, whisk together flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
  2. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until fluffy.
  3. Beat in molasses and egg until well combined.
  4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until a dough forms.
  5. Chill the dough for at least 1 hour.
  6. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  7. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/4 inch thick.
  8. Cut out gingerbread men shapes and place them on a baking sheet.
  9. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until edges are firm.
  10. Let cool completely before decorating with royal icing and candies.

item.title: Perfect Cut-Out Sugar Cookies for Decorating
item.description: These Perfect Cut-Out Sugar Cookies are not only delightful to eat but also a canvas for your creativity. Ideal for any occasion, they are easy to make and perfect for decorating with colorful icing and sprinkles.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: 25 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 24

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar
  • 1 egg
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and salt.
  3. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth.
  4. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
  5. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients.
  6. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/4 inch thick.
  7. Cut into desired shapes and place on baking sheets.
  8. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until edges are lightly golden.
  9. Let cool before decorating.

item.title: Grandma's No-Fail Pumpkin Pie
item.description: Indulge in the comforting flavors of Grandma's No-Fail Pumpkin Pie, a delightful dessert that brings warmth to any gathering. With its creamy filling and perfectly spiced crust, this pie is sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 (15 oz) can pumpkin puree
  • 1 (14 oz) can sweetened condensed milk
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 (9-inch) unbaked pie crust

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, mix together pumpkin puree, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and salt until smooth.
  3. Pour the filling into the unbaked pie crust.
  4. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then reduce the temperature to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and continue baking for 30-35 minutes, or until the filling is set.
  5. Let the pie cool before serving.

item.title: Strawberry Shortcake
item.description: Indulge in the delightful layers of fluffy shortcake, fresh strawberries, and homemade whipped cream. This classic dessert is not only easy to make but also a crowd-pleaser that will brighten any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 3/4 cup milk

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
  3. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Stir in milk until just combined.
  5. Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead gently.
  6. Roll out to 1-inch thickness and cut into rounds.
  7. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
  8. While the cakes bake, whip the heavy cream with sugar until soft peaks form.
  9. Once the cakes are cool, slice them in half, layer with strawberries and whipped cream, and serve.

item.title: The Easiest Apple Crisp
item.description: Experience the warm, comforting flavors of fall with this easy apple crisp recipe. Perfectly sweetened apples topped with a crunchy, buttery oat topping make for a delightful dessert that everyone will love.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 cups apples, peeled and sliced
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour (or gluten-free flour)
  • 1/2 cup vegan butter or regular butter
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, cinnamon, and a bit of brown sugar. Toss to coat.
  3. In another bowl, mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Spread the apple mixture in a baking dish and top with the oat mixture.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the apples are tender and the topping is golden brown.

item.title: Classic Apple Crisp with Buttery Oat Topping
item.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting flavors of this classic apple crisp, where juicy apples meet a buttery, crunchy topping. It's the perfect dessert to celebrate the fall season and satisfy your sweet cravings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 50 minutes

â° Total Time: 65 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 6 cups sliced apples
  • 1 cup brown sugar
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. Mix well.
  3. Transfer the apple mixture to a greased baking dish.
  4. In another bowl, mix rolled oats, flour, and melted butter until crumbly.
  5. Sprinkle the oat mixture evenly over the apples.
  6. Bake for 40-50 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.

item.title: Cozy Apple Crisp
item.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting flavors of this cozy apple crisp, where flaky, buttery topping meets tender, spiced apples. It's the perfect dessert for chilly evenings or gatherings, guaranteed to impress your guests!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 35 minutes

  • 1 cup all-purpose flour

  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, mix sliced apples with cinnamon and place them in a greased baking dish.
  3. In another bowl, combine oats, flour, brown sugar, and melted butter until crumbly.
  4. Spread the oat mixture evenly over the apples.
  5. Bake for 30-35 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.

item.title: Best Pumpkin Bread Recipe
item.description: Indulge in the warmth of homemade pumpkin bread, a moist and flavorful treat that brings the essence of fall to your kitchen. Perfect for breakfast or as a delightful snack, this recipe is sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, and vegetable oil until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the pumpkin mixture, stirring until just combined.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  8. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.title: Easy Homemade Apple Crisp
item.description: Indulge in this delightful apple crisp, where tender apples meet a crunchy, buttery topping. Perfect for cozy nights or festive gatherings, this recipe is sure to warm your heart and satisfy your sweet tooth.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 cups apples, peeled and sliced
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 cup butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a mixing bowl, combine the sliced apples with cinnamon and salt, then place them in a greased baking dish.
  3. In another bowl, mix the oats, brown sugar, flour, and melted butter until crumbly.
  4. Spread the oat mixture evenly over the apples.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.

item.title: Irresistibly Moist Pumpkin Bread with Crunchy Streusel Topping
item.description: Indulge in the cozy flavors of fall with this irresistibly moist pumpkin bread topped with a crunchy streusel. Perfect for crisp autumn days, it fills your kitchen with a warm, inviting aroma that makes every slice a heavenly treat.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 1

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup chopped nuts (optional)
  • 1/2 cup streusel topping

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, vegetable oil, and eggs until well combined.
  3. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined. Fold in the nuts if using.
  5. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and sprinkle the streusel topping evenly over the top.
  6. Bake for 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  7. Allow to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
item.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting flavors of this Spiced Pumpkin Bread, perfect for cozy fall days. With its moist texture and delightful spice blend, this recipe will quickly become a seasonal favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup raisins (optional)

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, and sugar until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, spices, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Fold in raisins if using.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
  8. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.title: Best Cinnamon Sugar Pumpkin Bread
item.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting flavors of this cinnamon sugar pumpkin bread. Perfectly moist and topped with a crunchy cinnamon sugar layer, it's an irresistible treat for any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 1

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 cup sugar for topping
  • 1 tablespoon cinnamon for topping

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, and vegetable oil until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
  7. In a small bowl, mix together the sugar and cinnamon for the topping, then sprinkle it evenly over the batter.
  8. Bake for 45-50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
  9. Allow to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.title: No-Bake Pumpkin Delight
item.description: Experience the essence of autumn with this No-Bake Pumpkin Delight, a dessert that combines a crispy ginger snap crust with a smooth cream cheese layer and a luscious pumpkin filling. Topped with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon, it's a delightful tribute to fall that will leave you craving more.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 9

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 package ginger snap cookies, crushed
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 8 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 can (15 ounces) pumpkin puree
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1 cup heavy whipping cream
  • Additional cinnamon for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix crushed ginger snap cookies with melted butter until well combined.
  2. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9x13 inch dish to form the crust.
  3. In another bowl, beat the cream cheese and powdered sugar until smooth.
  4. Add the pumpkin puree, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon to the cream cheese mixture and mix until well blended.
  5. Spread the pumpkin mixture over the crust evenly.
  6. In a separate bowl, whip the heavy cream until stiff peaks form, then spread it over the pumpkin layer.
  7. Sprinkle additional cinnamon on top for garnish.
  8. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

item.title: Candy Cane Cookies
item.description: Create magical candy cane cookies with this easy, nostalgic recipe! These buttery peppermint swirl cookies are perfect for Christmas baking, cookie swaps, or edible gifts, making them a delightful treat for the holiday season.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 36

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 cup granulated sugar
  • 1 large egg
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 teaspoon peppermint extract
  • 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • Red and green food coloring
  • Powdered sugar for dusting

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
  2. In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
  3. Beat in the egg, vanilla extract, and peppermint extract until well combined.
  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a dough forms.
  6. Divide the dough in half. Color one half with red food coloring and leave the other half plain.
  7. Roll out small pieces of each color into long ropes, then twist them together to form a candy cane shape.
  8. Place the cookies on the prepared baking sheets and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until lightly golden.
  9. Allow to cool on a wire rack and dust with powdered sugar before serving.

item.title: Rice Krispie Christmas Puddings
item.description: These delightful Rice Krispie Christmas Puddings are a festive treat that brings joy to any gathering. Easy to make and fun for kids, they are the perfect sweet canape for your holiday celebrations.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 24

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 6 cups Rice Krispies cereal
  • 1 package (10 oz) marshmallows
  • 3 tablespoons butter
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • Chocolate for coating
  • Decorative sprinkles

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat.
  2. Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted.
  3. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
  4. Add Rice Krispies cereal and mix until well coated.
  5. Allow the mixture to cool slightly, then shape into small pudding-like forms.
  6. Dip each pudding into melted chocolate and decorate with sprinkles.

item.title: Santa Claus Macarons
item.description: Delight in the festive spirit with these charming Santa Claus Macarons, perfect for holiday gatherings. Their sweet filling and whimsical design will bring joy to your celebrations.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 100 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 22

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups powdered sugar
  • 1 cup almond flour
  • 3 large egg whites
  • 1/4 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • Red and white food coloring
  • Buttercream or ganache for filling

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 300Â°F (150Â°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
  2. In a bowl, sift together powdered sugar and almond flour.
  3. In a separate bowl, whip egg whites until foamy, then gradually add granulated sugar until stiff peaks form.
  4. Gently fold in the almond flour mixture and vanilla extract until combined.
  5. Divide the batter into two bowls, tint one red and leave the other white.
  6. Transfer the mixtures into piping bags and pipe small circles onto the prepared baking sheets.
  7. Let the macarons sit for 30 minutes to form a skin, then bake for 15-20 minutes.
  8. Allow to cool completely before filling with buttercream or ganache.

item.title: Crumbl Christmas Sugar Cookies
item.description: These delightful Crumbl Christmas Sugar Cookies are the perfect festive treat, soft and sweet with a touch of holiday magic. They are easy to make and will fill your home with the warm aroma of freshly baked cookies, making them a must for your holiday celebrations.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 19 minutes

â° Total Time: 34 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 15

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 1/2 cups white sugar
  • 1 egg
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon almond extract
  • 3/4 cup colored sugar for decoration

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a small bowl, stir together flour, baking soda, and baking powder.
  3. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
  4. Beat in the egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract.
  5. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients.
  6. Roll rounded teaspoonfuls of dough into balls, and place onto ungreased cookie sheets.
  7. Flatten each ball with the bottom of a glass, and sprinkle with colored sugar.
  8. Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden.
  9. Let cool on wire racks.

item.title: Shortbread Linzer Cookies with Raspberry Jam
item.description: Indulge in the delightful combination of buttery shortbread and tangy raspberry jam with these Shortbread Linzer Cookies. Perfect for the holiday season, these cookies are not only beautiful but also a treat for the taste buds!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 90 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 14

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1/2 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup raspberry jam

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter and powdered sugar until light and fluffy.
  3. Mix in the vanilla extract and salt.
  4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a dough forms.
  5. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/4 inch thick.
  6. Cut out shapes using a cookie cutter, and cut out a smaller shape in the center of half of the cookies.
  7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 12-15 minutes or until lightly golden.
  8. Let the cookies cool completely before spreading raspberry jam on the solid cookies and topping with the cut-out cookies.

item.title: Fondant au Chocolat
item.description: Indulge in the rich, velvety goodness of this classic Fondant au Chocolat, where each bite reveals a luscious molten center. Perfect for chocolate lovers, this dessert is sure to impress at any gathering.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 12 minutes

â° Total Time: 27 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 200g dark chocolate
  • 150g butter
  • 150g sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 50g flour

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Melt the dark chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
  2. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and sugar until pale and fluffy.
  3. Incorporate the melted chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, then gently fold in the flour.
  4. Pour the batter into greased ramekins and bake at 180Â°C for 12 minutes for a gooey center.
